class.name: ImmediateMesh
class.brief_description: Mesh optimized for creating geometry manually.
class.description: Mesh optimized for creating geometry manually, similar to OpenGL1.x immediate mode.

method.name: surface_add_vertex
method.description: Add a 3D vertex using the current attributes previously set.

method.name: surface_add_vertex_2d
method.description: Add a 2D vertex using the current attributes previously set.

method.name: surface_end
method.description: End and commit current surface. Note that surface being created will not be visible until this function is called.

method.name: surface_set_color
method.description: Set the color attribute that will be pushed with the next vertex.

method.name: surface_set_normal
method.description: Set the normal attribute that will be pushed with the next vertex.

method.name: surface_set_tangent
method.description: Set the tangent attribute that will be pushed with the next vertex.

method.name: surface_set_uv
method.description: Set the UV attribute that will be pushed with the next vertex.

method.name: surface_set_uv2
method.description: Set the UV2 attribute that will be pushed with the next vertex.
